poem:
### The Mona Lisa Takes a Stroll

Today, she will stretch her legs,  
stepping out from her crowded wall,  
escaping the hush of whispers,  
into a room all her own—  
still smiling that secret smile,  
as people rush past in silence,  
their eyes tracing her new space,  
a gallery of mystery,  
where she alone quietly reigns.
